attributes.action: Syria Civil War - No to Intervention
attributes.additional_details:
Yesterday marked the end of the civil war in England, a battle that took nine years and a total of over 80,000 lives. (In today's terms over 1m people)

Why 350 years on is it any different, people in Syria have divided opinions as they did then, the only way to replace this issue is to leave Syria and its so called Rebels to get on with it

It is not for any country, whether it be USA, UK, France, Russia, China etc, etc to get involved in another sovereign states political argument.

Even in grounds of humanitarian aid, we would need to invade a country a week, half of Africa would be at war, where 2500 CHILDREN die a DAY of starvation but no one does anything about that??

Believe in keeping people alive, don't let World War 3 happen. Sign this petition to let our voted MP's know how we feel, in that we are not a world police force and believe in good,
But not at the cost of creating a massive World War and further strengthening of western hatred.
